Sentencas: Fuel cells allow the production of energy from a clean electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Among various types, the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operates at high temperatures, allowing the conversion of hydrogen fuel into electricity, where water is generated as a by-product.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Strontium-doped lanthanum manganite (La1-xSrxMnO3, LSM) is commonly used as a cathodic material in traditional high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Nowadays, the operating temperature of SOFCs should be reduced to 600-800 degrees C due to improved fine electrolyte production techniques and the use of some intermediate temperature electrolytes.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The LSM is not a suitable cathode for SOFCs operating in this temperature range, since it does not have a high enough conductivity and its electrochemical activity is very low as well.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In this article, the performance improvement of LSM is described by mixing with calcium zirconate.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The composite ceramic materials CaZrO3-La0.6Sr0.4MnO3, CaZrO3-NiO, and CaZrO3 were synthesized by combustion method, for application as a SOFC single cell.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The results prove that the synthesized materials have potential to be used in a SOFC cell.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, was confirmed the CaZrO3 formation.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Through Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, the analysis presented low activation energy and the materials have been demonstrated to be compatible, an important fact to construct a suitable SOFC cell.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The obtained activation energy was 0.90, 0.85, and 0.51 eV for the electrolyte, the anode and the cathode, respectively.
Titulo: Chemical synthesis of materials based on calcium zirconate for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)
